member.name: M:Unidash.Auth.Application.Controllers.ConnectController.Login(Unidash.Auth.Application.Features.Users.Requests.LoginUserRequest)
member.summary: Logins the user with the provided credentials and returns an access token that can be used for other services.

member.name: M:Unidash.Auth.Application.Controllers.UserController.GetUser
member.summary: Gets a single user based on the user ID extracted from the JWT token.
